name: Legion of Super Heroes: Ferro Lad Trivia Quiz | Entertainment | 10 Questions

questions.text: What is Ferro Lad's real name?
questions.explanation:
Andrew Nolan.

	Dave Wittenberg is an actor who provided the voice of Ferro Lad in the WB animated series, "The Legion of Super Heroes".

questions.text: What is Ferro Lad's home planet?
questions.explanation:
Earth.

	Ferro Lad was introduced in 'Adventure Comics' #346 (1966).

questions.text: Ferro Lad had a twin brother.  What was his name?
questions.explanation:
Douglas.

	Both Andrew and Douglas Nolan were born as mutants.

questions.text: What is Ferro Lad's super power?
questions.correct: He can turn his body into living iron
options: He can convert any inanimate object into iron
He can iron clothes as super speed
He can form iron shields from both hands
questions.explanation:
He can turn his body into living iron.

	Ferro Lad, and his brother Douglas, both were born with the mutant ability to turn their bodies into living iron.  This also provides them with super strength and skin that is nearly indestructible.

questions.text: Ferro Lad and his brother both wore iron masks over their entire heads with just two openings for their eyes.  Why was this?
questions.correct: They were born with grotesquely disfigured faces
options: They released pheromones which made people hate them
They were both former holo stars who seeked anonymity
questions.explanation:
They were born with grotesquely disfigured faces.

	The same mutation that gave them their powers also resulted in the two boys being born with faces so disfigured they had to hide them from public view.

questions.text: Ferro Lad had a relatively short career as a member of the Legion.  Just nine issues after his debut, he sacrifices his life to save the galaxy and all its inhabitants.  Who was responsible for his death?
questions.explanation:
A Sun-Eater.

	Ferro Lad dies in 'Adventure Comics' #353 (1967) when he carries a bomb into the center of the Sun-Eater in order to destroy it.

questions.text: Ferro Lad was created by writer Jim Shooter.  Why did Jim select Ferro Lad to kill off in his story titled, "The Doomed Legionnaire"?
questions.correct: DC would not allow him to let Ferro Lad be a black character
options: Ferro Lad was one of several characters up for random death selection
His power of super strength and invulnerability was redundant
Because he could replace Ferro Lad with his twin brother
questions.explanation:
DC would not allow him to let Ferro Lad be a black character.

	Jim Shooter created Ferro Lad with the intent that he be the first black-skinned Legionnaire.  His editor nixed this idea, telling Jim that it would cause them to lose their distribution in the south (U.S.).  With that, Jim decided to kill him off.

questions.text: Ferro Lad's brother eventually contracted a disease where his mind was opened to alternative realities and timelines.  This drove him insane.  Thanks to Brainiac 5 and the Time Institute, he was eventually helped.  How?
questions.correct: He was able to meld with a timeline where he became Ferro Man
options: He was taught to loop into a reality where his brother still lived
He was given a procedure similar to a 21st-century lobotomy
A cure was discovered by Rond Vidar and his sanity returned
questions.explanation:
He was able to meld with a timeline where he became Ferro Man.

	This event played out in 'Legion of Super Heroes' #300 (vol 2 - 1983).  The story was crafted with the specific intent of establishing "alternative" realities.  This freed writers from future events that had previously been established as canon in "Adult Legion" stories written decades previously.

questions.text: In the Post Zero Hour/Reboot continuity, Ferro Lad operates using a different code name.  What is it?
questions.explanation:
Ferro.

	In this continuity, Andrew and Douglas Nolan are the twin sons of a famous actress named Nancy Nolan, who abandoned the boys because of their grotesque appearance.

questions.text: In the Post Zero Hour/Reboot continuity, Ferro Lad shares something unique with this continuity's Valor (Mon-El).  What is it?
questions.correct: They are both are originally from the 20th century
options: They are both the only Legionnaires with a twin
They both have a female family member who becomes a Legionnaire
They both are expelled from the Legion
questions.explanation:
They are both are originally from the 20th century.

	Ferro is from the "present" and becomes a hero on his own.  When a group of Legionnaires travel to their past (our present), he meets them and decides to go with them when they return to the future.
